title: TFW you've always been a cosmic fidget spinner...

replies.body: whats with the sudden increase with fidget spinner posts?
Low quality shitposting.
is it like a meme now?
As much as that whole 1000 degree knife thing.
I don't get that. What was the fascination with turning a knife around twice fully, and then another 280 degrees?
It looked cool at the time, but now we found fidget spinners that can spin more than 1000 degrees
Apparently spinning it like that was making it supa hot fire and people were sticking such [knoives](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=H9_GlqRRs0s) in places.
I thought that was last week.
He was spinning fidgets before it was cool.
im investing in this post

You won't regret it pal.
http://img00.deviantart.net/70cb/i/2016/115/8/b/umad_sol_by_commander_squall-da08c8m.png

Get out. You defiled the one champion I care for. I'm sending you the cleaning, psychiatrist, and chemo therapy bills.

Draven is obvious, and encouraged. But this. no.
{{champion:136}} You can call it fidget orbiter if that helps :3

Zed is the fidget spinning master 
https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/277245008250273792/318620399527264257/tumblr_oqg21pyBQ51se7neto1_500.png
Whoever mentions spinners should have no _sol_..
Too forced mate.
I never even noticed... FORGIVE ME SOOOOOOOOLLLLL
https://pbs.twimg.com/media/Ckic_WLUoAADT98.jpg

{{champion:432}} 

think again!!
I was like when the gif gonna finish loading. o it is. ok
I love me some sol. That's for sure. M6 working on M7 for him.
